title: The Owner/Developer may develop the entire plot for the purpose of entertainment of general public s
clause_text: The Owner/Developer may develop the entire plot for the purpose of entertainment of general public such as Drama Theater/Opera theater/Mini-theater/Multiplex/ Art Gallery/Video Hall
